dublinCore.dc:title: 106 HR 6427 : Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend the Red River National Wildlife Refuge Act to modify the boundary of the Red River National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act.

section.header: Red River National Wildlife Refuge boundary modification

subsection.text: Section 3(a)(1) of the Red River National Wildlife Refuge Act (Public Law 106–300; 114 Stat. 1055) is amended by striking map entitled Red River National Wildlife Refuge—Selection Area, dated September 5, 2000 and inserting map entitled Red River National Wildlife Refuge Acquisition Boundary and dated March 21, 2022.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 12, 2022.
